str

Affliction¶

class scripts.skills.affliction.Affliction(affliction_name, duration, affected_entity)[source]¶

Affliction, either Bane or Boon. Applies a periodic effect to an Entity, dictated by its AfflictionTrigger.

name¶

string name of the Affliction

Type

str

description¶

description of the Affliction

Type

str

icon¶

pygame image to symbolise the Affliction

Type

pygame.Image

affliction_category¶

Bane or Boon

Type

AfflictionCategory

duration¶

amount of applications before expiry

Type

int

trigger_event¶

the event that triggers the Affliction to activate

Type

AfflictionTriggers

affected_entity¶

the Entity being impacted by the Affliction

Type

Entity

affliction_effects¶

list of AfflictionEffects

Type

list(AfflictionEffect)

trigger()[source]¶

Trigger all affliction effects and decrement duration by 1

Affliction Effects¶

Affliction Effect¶

class scripts.skills.affliction_effects.affliction_effect.AfflictionEffect(owner, name, description)[source]¶

Base class for affliction_effects that make up the basis of afflictions. They are effectively a simplified version of skill_effects

trigger()[source]¶

Trigger the effect
